content.text:
# Draft:Emma Warren

Emma Warren is a singer currently performing with longstanding Celtic band Celtic Woman.
In 2023 she married dancer Shaun Kelly whom she met while they both performed in Riverdance.
Theatre
Emma has played the role of Cinderella and also Jill in Jack and the beanstalk.
Emma participated in the BBC talent show [https://www.bbc.co.uk/dorothy/dorothys/emmawarren.shtml Looking for a new Dorothy.]
In 2020 Emma's [https://www.facebook.com/watch/?v=263851628210604 Facebook page] uploaded a video of her singing the famous and well covered song Fields of Gold. The version was inspired by a version featured on The Voice.
Celtic Woman
Emma has been a member of Celtic Woman since 2023, appearing alongside violinist Tara McNeill and vocalists Mair√©ad Carlin and Muirgen O'Mahony. With Celtic Woman Emma has performed various songs and on at least one occasion also played the piano simultaneous to singing. She has also featured in the band's 20th anniversary celebrations. Emma has sung the slow, reflective song "Umbrella."
Emma trained at the Royal Welsh College of Music & Drama.
